name: Lazer Kitten Footie
description:
There are cats playing soccer and shooting lasers... need I say more?

Direction Keys - Walk/Dash
A - Kick / (Hold: Aim+Kick)
S - Shoot Lazer / (Hold: Aim+Shoot)

Still in development. If you have feedback or just want to follow along hop on Discord:
https://discord.gg/f5QU6aE
